amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 115-677 to express a sense of congress encouraging partnerships at the watershed level between nonpoint sources and regulated point sources to advance the goals of the Water Pollution Control Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gibbs amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Gibbs.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gibbs amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
